title: High-res Studio HDRi pack
description:
- -+- -+- -+- -+- High-res Studio HDRi set -+- -+- -+- -+- -+- -

 1. General
 2. Public Domain Certification

1. General

This is a set of 19 high resolution High Dynamic Range Images
for commercial or non-commercial use. The images are in 32-bit
Radiance format at 10240*5120px. Smaller images are available at

---

encouraged to credit the author, but this is not mandatory.
